name: v2 Reimbursement Action Code
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0459 ( Reimbursement Action Code)

concept.display: OCE line item denial or rejection is not ignored
OCE line item denial or rejection is ignored
External line item denial. Line item is denied even if no OCE edits
External line item rejection. Line item is rejected even if no OCE edits
